thread.title: A U.S. Battlefield Victory Against Russia’s ‘Little Green Men’

author: Tod Lindberg
title: A U.S. Battlefield Victory Against Russia’s ‘Little Green Men’
text:
The U.S. military has created a new precedent for how to counter Russian “hybrid war.” Set in a murky clash of arms in Syria in early February, and one averted in March, this precedent—you might even call it a “red line”—will reverberate from the Middle East to the Black and Baltic seas. 

The problem is the appearance on your territory of what defense-policy wonks call “little green men.” They come heavily armed and dressed for combat. They operate at the direction of a government, Vladimir Putin’s Russia. Yet they wear no...
